game.name: Walk the Dog on Paper
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 앱 내 구매, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 스테레오 사운드, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Blast through a top-down world with a plethora of dogs. Improve your skateboard and driving skills for maximum mayhem. Collect dog cards and music cassettes for your music player.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Blast through a top-down world with a plethora of dogs. Improve your skateboard and driving skills for maximum mayhem. Collect dog cards and music cassettes for your music player.
